html_to_pdf.description: Convert HTML content (string) to PDF document

props.name: htmlContent
props.description: The HTML content to convert to PDF

props.name: outputFilename
props.description: The filename for the generated PDF

props.name: page_size
props.description: Set the output page size using standard formats (A4, Letter, A3, etc.).

props.name: page_width
props.description: Set custom page width (e.g., "8.27in", "210mm"). The safe maximum is 200in.

props.name: page_height
props.description: Set custom page height. Set to "-1" for a single-page PDF that expands to fit all content.

props.name: orientation
props.description: Set the output page orientation.

props.name: margin_top
props.description: Control white space at the top of the page (e.g., "0.4in", "10mm").

props.name: margin_right
props.description: Control white space on the right edge of the page.

props.name: margin_bottom
props.description: Control white space at the bottom of the page.

props.name: margin_left
props.description: Control white space on the left edge of the page.

props.name: content_viewport_width
props.description: Set the viewport width for formatting the HTML content.

props.name: custom_css
props.description: Apply custom CSS to modify the visual appearance and layout of your content.

props.name: custom_javascript
props.description: Run custom JavaScript after the document is loaded and ready to print.

props.name: element_to_convert
props.description: Convert only the specified element using CSS selector (e.g., "#content", ".article").

props.name: header_html
props.description: HTML content for the page header.

props.name: header_url
props.description: URL of the page header HTML.

props.name: footer_html
props.description: HTML content for the page footer.

props.name: footer_url
props.description: URL of the page footer HTML.

props.name: page_watermark
props.description: Apply a watermark PDF overlay to every page of the output.

props.name: multipage_watermark
props.description: Apply each page of a watermark PDF to corresponding output pages.

props.name: page_background
props.description: Apply a background PDF to every page of the output.

props.name: multipage_background
props.description: Apply each page of a background PDF to corresponding output pages.
